mapper.select: select*from (select rownum as rnum, b.*from (select notice_num as noticeNum, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_date as noticeDate, notice_read_count as noticeReadCount from notice_tbl where notice_kind=0 order by 1 desc)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from notice_tbl where notice_kind=0
